Viewing Distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
Summary: SPACESHIP LANDED IN WOODED AREA FROM MY HOME
divs: Sighting DetailsJULY 7,2005 9:30 PM I WAS LOADING A LADDER ONTO VAN WHEN I SAW A SPACEHIP IN THE SKY COMING FROM THE WEST I SAW A LIGHTED SPACESHIP WITH LANDING GEAR IT FLIPPED UP ON ITS SIDE TO AVOID HITTING SOME OF THE TREES AND THE TOP OF IT HAD A BIG LIGHT WHICH GLOWED SIMILIAR TO THE MOON AND IT LANDED IN A WOODED AREA ACROSS THE ROAD.THERE WAS INTENSE BRIGHT LIGHTS UNDERNEATH THE SHIP THE LIGHTS WERE BRIGHT AS A BOLT OF LIGHTING. AFTER ABOUT 15 MINUTES THE LIGHTS WENT OUT. I CROSSED THE ROAD AND WENT INTO THE WOODS TO SEE WHAT IT WAS. I CAME AROUND THE HILL THERE WERE 2 POLICE CARS THEY HAD SAW IT PREVIOUSLY IN THE SKY GOING OVER WAL-MART PARKING LOT.THEY LEFT CONTINUED TO WALK OVER TO THE ARE WHERE I SAW IT.WHEN I GOT IN A DISTANCE THE SHIP HAD A LARGE FAN COVERING THE BOTTOM OF THE SHIP A DIM GLOW OF LIGHTS SHOWED FROM UNDERNEATH.THERE WERE 3 STEPS THAT CAME FROM UNDERNEATH WITH A SMALL DOOR ON THE SIDE OF THE SHIP. I WALKED AROUND IT AND LOOKED UNDDERNEATH IT I THOUGHT IT WAS FROM THE AIRFORCE. I WALKED INSIDE IT WAS DARK INSIDE THE FAN WAS BLOWING AIR REMINDED ME OF A BROILER ROOM IN A FACTORY. I SAW A HEAD THAT LOOKED LIKE A KANGEROO. THE INSIDE WAS FILLED WITH ELECTRICAL CABLES WITH VENT PIPES GOING UP TO THE TOP OF THE SHIP. THERE WERE 3 THEY TURNED AROUND THEY WERE SHORT WITH LARGE BLACK EYES. THEY HAD SKIN LIKE A LIZZARD. THEY CAME TOWARD ME BUT MADE NO SOUND OF COMMUNICATION.i HAD A FLASHLIGHT IN MY HAND THEY REACHED FOR THE LIGHT. I HANDED THEM THE LIGHT THEY BEGN SHAKING THE LIGHT. I JUST STOOD THERE LOOKING AT THEM I TRIED TO COMMUNICATE WITH THEM BUT THEY DID NOT RESPOND BUT THEY WERE LOOKING AT ME CURIOUSLY. ONE TOUCHED ME ON THE ARM AND IT SCARED ME SO I RAN OUT OF THE WOODS AND BACK ACROSS THE ROAD.
